name: Martha Madison: Forces
description: Can you help the penguins in their quest for ice bricks? In Martha Madison: Forces, students use forces, acceleration, inertia, and friction to move giant ice blocks across a frozen landscape. Once the correct forces are applied, ice choppers are put to work, breaking the blocks into small bricks that Marthaâ€™s penguin friends need to...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Atom x5-Z8350 1.44GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
